str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 2nd Person Singular
str2: Of yourself.
(a) down, below, also: downwards, (b) lower, under, less, of a length of time. Also katotero; adverb from kata; downwards.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To give orders (injunctions, instructions, commands). From en and the base of telos; to enjoin.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A hand.

word: so that You will not strike
parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From pros and kopto; to strike at, i.e. Surge against; specially, to stub on, i.e. Trip up.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The foot. A primary word; a 'foot'.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
A stone; met: of Jesus as the chief stone in a building. Apparently a primary word; a stone.
